attributes.title: Access Requests [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"title": "Access Requests [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [], "type": "metrics", "params": {"axis_position": "left", "interval": "", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.operation_name : *LISTKEYS*"}, "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "show_grid": 1, "type": "timeseries", "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "isModelInvalid": false, "time_field": "", "axis_formatter": "number", "series": [{"split_mode": "filter", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "event.outcome : \"success\" or event.outcome : \"Success\" "}, "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "stacked": "none", "point_size": 1, "label": "Success", "formatter": "number", "color": "#68BC00", "chart_type": "line", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "line_width": "2", "fill": "0", "separate_axis": 0}, {"split_mode": "filter", "axis_position": "right", "filter": {"language": "kuery", "query": "event.outcome : \"Failure\"  or event.outcome : \"failure\"  "}, "id": "1b5f75a0-ec15-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "stacked": "none", "point_size": 1, "label": "Failure", "formatter": "number", "color": "rgba(226,115,0,1)", "chart_type": "line", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "1b5f75a1-ec15-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "line_width": "2", "fill": "0", "separate_axis": 0}], "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "axis_scale": "normal", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "show_legend": 0}}
